articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Reports of ad-supported Xbox game streams show Microsoft’s lack of imagination - Ars Technica
articles.description: Xbox maker needs some fresher ideas for expanding access to cloud gaming.

articles.author: Lucy Handley
articles.title: Trump is going to Davos — here are the big names who aren't - CNBC
articles.description: A who's who of heads of state, top CEOs and tech pioneers are landing in Davos for the 2026 World Economic Forum meeting. But some big names aren't going.
articles.content:
An aerial view of the town ahead of World Economic Forum (WEF), also known as Davos Summit in Davos, Switzerland on January 14, 2024.
J.P. Morgan CEO Jamie Dimon, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelen… [+7556 chars]
